TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DiscoveryService extends System.Object

summary.span: 用來實作探索服務的抽象基底類別。

span.span: An abstract base class used to implement a discovery service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將 加入至服務時，會使用預設的 實作處理尋找和解析要求。When a is added to a service, a default implementation is used to handle Find and Resolve requests. 延伸此類別可實作自訂探索服務，其行為會與預設實作不同，例如使用自訂比對演算法回覆尋找要求。Extend this class to implement a custom discovery service that has behavior different from the default implementation, such as to reply to Find requests using a custom matching algorithm

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: 傳輸用於識別重複訊息的最大訊息雜湊數目。

span.span: The maximum number of message hashes used by the transport for identifying duplicate messages.
The default value is 0.

summary.span: 使用指定的 和重複訊息記錄長度，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified and duplicate message history length.

span.span: The find request context that describes the service to discover.

param.name: callback

span.span: Override this method to handle a find operation.

returns.span: 暫止的非同步作業參考。

span.span: A reference to the pending asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次或多次呼叫 方法，可傳回尋找結果。Find results are returned by calling the method one or more times.
